table.caption: House Intrigue
rows: Dragonmarked houses vie for influence over a prominent individual (perhaps one of the characters).
Dragonmarked houses compete for control of a key site.
Tension builds between two rival dragonmarked houses, threatening to erupt into a deadly feud.
Villains from two or more dragonmarked houses form a dangerous alliance.
A villain tries to disrupt an alliance between two or more dragonmarked houses.
Splinter factions from two dragonmarked houses try toform a new house.
table.name: Dragonmarked Intrigue Adventures; House Intrigue
